list.description:
#sight #niko #oneshot #alltanks #spotter #pancake
Niko spotter sight
Niko's here to help!

Sight works with all tanks.

HOW TO INSTALL:

1. Install the sight

2. Go to the War Thunder folder and click "User Sights"

3. Make a file and name it "all_tanks"

4. Copy and paste the sight in the "all_tanks" folder

5. Boot up War Thunder and go into "Sight Settings" (options < ground vehicle battle settings)

6. Now you have Niko help you spot tanks, maybe even help you with your tunnel vision!

IF I SAW YOU GOONING TO THIS, I'M GONNA SEND A T9...
Еще одна Эна осталось дапилить еще одну и там дальше другой контент будет.

#touhou #touhou_project #anime

They're my own thighs in fishnets :3
originally had 11 thousand lines and quads, but I removed all lines once finished.
or else War Thunder would NOT display correctly.

Open 4 Sights Commissions, If you want to Request a Commission Reach out to knuttersmen on Discord

This is a SFW Sight! [Safe-For-Work]

Installation Guide

1) Unzip The Sight Zip File into your main Sights folder.

[Location should be \WarThunder\UserSights\all_tanks]

2) Note that after You install a sight you need to Reboot/Restart the game

3) Go to test drive and go in sight settings in OPTIONS (find the sight and save it)

4) Once in test drive, press F9 to update sights (it might refresh automatically aswell)

list.description:
Прицел в стиле Тосака Рин из аниме "Судьба/Ночь схватки" (Fate/Stay Night). Лаконичный дизайн с элементами, вдохновлёнными её образом: длинные волосы с чёрными бантами и крестик на шее. Идеально для фанатов аниме и Fate-серии!


#TosakaRin #FateStayNight #Animepicel #Wtlive #Destiny #FateSeries #AnimeDesign

#anime #touhou_project
Sight with character from touhou project (Yuka Kazami)

==================================
#anime#Rena#Ryuuguu#alltanks#sights
==================================

Rena

1. Extract all the files from the zip folder.

2. Open the folder all_tanks

3. Upload everything from this folder to the same folder only now in War Thunder

As if you had a problem you can also see the video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XCpOgLYGrQI

2 file to edit.

Acquire your foes with style with this modification of @KurumiShiramine 's MBT sight with the iconic DOOM HUD! 😎

The zip file has the JSON to modify the position, scale or add new lines and shapes into the sight (the DOOM hud) in this website called WTdraw:
https://solawk.github.io/wtdraw/

Best used for tanks with a two-plane stabilizer and with laser rangefinder for high tier tank engagements.

#universal #alltanks #all_tanks #doom #mbt #sight #sights
